website_summaries.verdict: A fantastic choice for on-the-go customers wanting a multi-use mirror for traveling.
pros: Extremely compact design features two distortion-free mirrors
Features 10x magnification, which is ideal for applying makeup
Comes with an adjustable stand for hands-free viewing
LED bulbs do not need to be replaced and function with a power switch
cons: Batteries to power the LED lights can be confusing to install

customer_reviews.title: I had this mirror for about 5 years and used ...
customer_reviews.text: I had this mirror for about 5 years and used it when I traveled. Unfortunately when I was packing for a trip a few weeks ago I dropped it and the mirror shattered. I immediately went online to order the same mirror. When I opened Amazon and put in "lighted travel mirror" many new options popped up. I didn't even consider them - I ordered the tried and true one that I previously had. This works perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted for my vanity/travel.
customer_reviews.text: This mirror exceeded my expectations. Perfect for traveling or everyday use. It is sturdy and provides ample lighting.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting, compact
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT -- exactly what I was looking for, for when I'm traveling. The LED lights are perfect brightness, and the 10x mirror really helps to see everything on your face. Really helps those doing eye makeup. I love that it's compact and easy to work with. If you're wondering how or where to put the batteries, it's the bottom panel. You turn the lid, so don't try and stick a sharp object in the tiny slot to open it because you'll break it that way.
customer_reviews.author: ORclimber

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I immediately sent this item back, and I never return anything. The regular mirror would be a nice little lighted compact mirror, but the 10X mirror is a joke! It's so small, and so magnified, that you must close one eye to only see a tiny part of your face. Not even one whole eyebrow! And then the image is blurry. Using this would be like shaping your brows looking in a chrome car bumper! I don't understand the good reviews for this useless thing. UPDATE! I received a nice email from this company after I returned the mirror. I give them props for good customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Southern Folk

customer_reviews.title: Mirror is great for tweezing
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror except for the color of the LEDs used. They are blue! Not good for applying makeup if you are using colors. Maybe for foundation only. Works fine for tweezing. I love the size and the mirrors, which are distortion-free.
customer_reviews.author: Joletta H

customer_reviews.title: Yes, you should buy this!
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome. Light weight and surprisingly bright. I was looking at another brand that was 2x as expensive and I was so happy I found this one. It's great not only for traveling but to have on hand when tweezing or your makeup on the go. It is difficult to open at first but within five minutes I had figured out the batteries and could consistently open and close it. Honestly would buy more in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little travel mirror
customer_reviews.text: Great little travel mirror! I am totally dependent on my make up mirror at home so when traveling I would take a Walmart round mirror that was magnified, this is soooo much easier to use!!! I find I leave this on my bathroom sink and use to check back of my hair and one last close up before walking out door!
customer_reviews.author: cassie's mom

customer_reviews.title: : /  Not very bright, must be *really* up close, and light switch is awkward : /
customer_reviews.text: My 3 complaints: 1) To see your face you have to be *really* up close. What that means is that you can only really see the front of your face with it. If you only care about the front of your cheeks, nose, and middle forehead, then you're ok. Otherwise, it's not effective for spaces of your face outside of those. 2) The light is not very bright. 3) To turn on the light you need to open the clamshell in 2 places, which is not necessarily easy to do, and I don't know why they wouldn't just make the light switch accessible on the outside. Sadly, not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: GB10

customer_reviews.title: Cheap mirror
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mirror for my upcoming trip, and it worked great. It's compact and fits in my suitcase nicely. The only downfall is the light doesn't last long; as the batteries drain, the lights get dimmer and dimmer. UPDATED: It broke! This mirror lasted all of 4 months before the hinge holding both halves of the mirror broke. It's not meant to be used daily. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! I bought this to use when traveling. I put batteries in and it turned on. So I put it in my travel bag. On my first trip, I took it out to use it and it wouldn’t turn on. I assumed I had accidentally left it on and the batteries were dead. When I replaced the batteries, it still didn’t work. So I never got to use it once and it’s too late to return it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: cbalmer3

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror but could use better lighting
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is nice but the LED light is not bright enough. *Update 2/19/18* - This company was nice enough to refund me a partial amount of $8.00 because of my review. This was unexpected because I did not request it but I do appreciate this company's efforts to make me happy. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Violet G.

customer_reviews.title: Small - Good for Travel Only
customer_reviews.text: I wanted small and it is! I can only look in one eye at a time. I have to put it on top of tissue box or similar to get close to good height or sit and use it on desk top. It does the job, but it took a while to get used to focusing with one eye. I use a larger mirror at home.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great Magnifying Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been? I literally just threw my old compact mirror away. I really enjoyed some of the led magnifying mirrors in hotels while traveling. This mirror gives me the option of a compact and at home version. It is bright enough to really see hair for plucking eyebrow and those pesky hairs hairs (you know what I mean!) at the 10x side (be prepared- you can get a real close up of your skin!). The brightness makes all the difference. Either side is good is good for make up application. It is thicker than a regular compact because it has 3 sections (10x /regular/ and stand). I love the usb charging option.
customer_reviews.author: Luv 2 Shop

customer_reviews.title: At last a small lightweight lighted high mag travel mirror!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for years for a lighted high magnification with regular magnification travel mirror that doesn't weigh a ton or take up too much room and I have finally found it. This gives me every thing I have been needing. The opening is a little tricky at first, but okay after reading and following the instructions. Also like that it adjusts in height to proper face height and you get both mirrors open at same time without having to flip from side to side or turn mirror around. I have traveled with it several times to both hotels and homes and have been pleased with its performance. Exactly what I have been searching for!
customer_reviews.author: Alfie

customer_reviews.title: Best Little Magnifying Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror. I have purchased it before, but gave it to a friend. I ordered this one to replace it. It used to be that all the hotels had magnifying mirrors in the bathrooms but no longer, so I took this on vacation with me (folds up compact!) so I can apply my makeup! Using the stand on the bottom frees up your hands! It's great... I wish they had the same one with 15% magnification.
customer_reviews.author: Witzerklutz

customer_reviews.title: I love this mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, just what I needed. The package was shipped promptly and worked when I tweezed my eyebrows and other stray hairs above the lip. I cannot recommend these mirrors enough to other women or those that have to do much facial grooming, they are convenient and provide a great view of your face in natural and under a bright light.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck R

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: This item takes real batteries. I used it for about a half hour/day while traveling, and the lights became dull and relatively useless after just a few days. Its battery drains very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Extendable mirror
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little mirror. Very bright. Love that if extenders! Great little travel mirror. When compacted it measures about 3 in depth. Gave it only 4 stars because the switch to turn on light is stiff. Switch goes half way to turn on bottom light only then push it all the way to light both mirror. Truly love this mirror. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Huff

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror and versatile
customer_reviews.text: I like the versatility. It is not a compact mirror to slip in your purse. The led lights seem to be a hindrance to me, natural light works best for the size of the mirror. My review is neutral because it has good and not so good features.
customer_reviews.author: Schreps

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I used the mirror (good concept) 2 days, stored it in the original box and after the second use it would not fold down again!
customer_reviews.author: Allyn

customer_reviews.title: A little chunky but new travel companion
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome alternative to taking a ring light and vanity with you! I took this on a 2 week trip and honestly carried this with me everywhere! I recommend this to everyone I came across and honestly could not be happier! I wish the lights were a little bit more blinding (intense) I love super bright lights! :)
customer_reviews.author: Karelys Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but works great for me!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! The light is bright, and the size is perfect for me. It is a little tricky to open sometimes. I do not use it on a counter, so it works for me. But it does not balance well, and if that is what you want I do not recommend. For a handheld mirror though, its great.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Lazar

customer_reviews.title: Great for overnight bag, Too big for purse
customer_reviews.text: For my personal needs I would give this a 3 star rating as it's much to bulky to carry in your purse....but that isn't the products fault and it does exactly what it says very well. My own fault for not paying attention to the measurements. If you want something to toss in a suitcase or overnight bag this is your mirror. If you want something for your purse keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: S Hawes

customer_reviews.title: Beware of battery installation
customer_reviews.text: Instruction are poor as with most foreign made products. For example, instructions on inserting batteries. "Install batteries." No word as to how to remove the base plate to get them or pictures. I try to pry it off with a screwdrive and finally figured out you have to twist it. Sure would of be nice to have been told this! Fortunately, product is much better than instructions.
customer_reviews.author: donnie

customer_reviews.title: Makes it easy to see everything
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to travel with, but am using it at home now too. Love how bright it lights up, and that you can adjust the angle, making it great for applying makeup, and easy to see those pesky chin hairs I’m trying to get rid of. I will say It is slightly bigger and bulkier than ideal if all you’re packing is a carry-on, but I haven’t seen anything better that includes the same features.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel mirror - compact and well made with great ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect travel mirror - compact and well made with great magnification on one mirror and the other is regular view. Both mirrors have LED lighting which can be controlled by a switch which turns lights off, one light on or both lights on. It was well packaged so nothing was broken. I would recommend this mirror if you plan to travel or just need a small mirror at home.
customer_reviews.author: D.D. Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quirky but as described
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about this mirror. It is exactly as pictured, and the description is accurate. That said, the light makes my face look rather unnatural, and it is weird to open, deploy, and change the batteries. It's kinda quirky. But it is a pretty big size, and it will fit the bill when I'm traveling.
customer_reviews.author: J.A. Grier

customer_reviews.title: Okay travel mirror
customer_reviews.text: I recently cracked my shaving mirror and hoped this would serve a dual purpose as shaving mirror and travel mirror. The quality of the mirrors is good, but the heights of the mirrors are inflexible. To use the 10x mirror, you need to uncomfortably close. To use the 1x mirror, you must hold the mirrors in your hand and lift them to your face.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C.

customer_reviews.title: Good product for travel
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is exactly what I wanted to use during travel. Due to my poor eyesight, I need a well illuminated product. It is compact and does the job. I ordered this product for an upcoming trip. There was a delay in the shipping, so I ordered a second through PRIME and it arrived 2 days later as promised. The first one ordered actually arrived after I left for my trip. Upon contacting the seller about the first one (and the fact I didn't need two) their response was immediate and we worked together to resolve the matter quickly. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: B. Coughlin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 10x magnification
customer_reviews.text: Great idea for use on vacation with a lighted magnifying mirror. Only drawback, it was a little difficult to open, put the battery cover back on, and I thought would not rotate back/forth enough to hit the off/on switch. After several times opening the mirror, I got the hang of how it works and now it works like a gem. Only 4 starts due to the difficulty in the initial opening of unit; very stiff to move initially.
customer_reviews.author: Lady just

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel companion
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mirror. I use it traveling and in my camper. Kind of bulky but definitely sturdy and well made. I can see those unwanted hairs with the magnification. Yes I would recommend it and purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Poodle Diva

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good travel mirror - not too big, and one that would light up. It was great for that. It was a bit heavier than I thought it would be, but that is irrelevant to the use of it. Was great when I had to get ready in a dark room. The ability to angle it helped the most.
customer_reviews.author: M. Morton

customer_reviews.title: Clever, functional
customer_reviews.text: This works. A bit heavier than I would like for my lightweight packing but so functional. Most hotels have terrible bathroom lighting so my travel mirrors don't help. This is a very clever design. I chose black because I want to find it in my suitcase. This would be even better if there were a choice of bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: Red Bear

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this compact travel mirror
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this compact travel mirror. I purchased it for a recent trip and was very pleased. It was easy to pack and use. Love the light settings and the fact that you can use it in the lower position or use the extender to make the mirror higher. Overall a great purchase perfect for travel. I would definitely buy this mirror again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Large for a 'compact' mirro
customer_reviews.text: Had no problems turning bottom section to install batteries as others have commented on, nor on opening it up to extend to full height. However, the mirror is GIGANTIC. It is easily twice the thickness (when folded completely) AND has much less magnification than a black model (not by same manufacturer). The size issue is problematic if you plan to travel with this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror
customer_reviews.text: This is a great compact mirror. The light is very bright. Something I always need. This is perfect for travel and home. It is about 1.5 inches deep when closed. So might not be good for a small purse. But will be perfect for a carry on bag. I would recommend this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Pat D

customer_reviews.title: Love it except for battery life...
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, the magnification and lights are perfect. Only problem is the battery life is really low. It takes 3 AAA batteries (some included) and they get expensive, that's my only dislike about this.
customer_reviews.author: C McC - Tennessee

customer_reviews.title: Compact enough for travel
customer_reviews.text: Loving this mirror and do not travel without it! Fantastic magnification -- nearly too close! It's a bit heavy, part of that is from the multiple AA batteries it requires for the mirror lights. It does suck up the battery power relatively quickly, though; rechargeable batteries recommended.
customer_reviews.author: immowsi

customer_reviews.title: Great travel mirror !
customer_reviews.text: Love this travel mirror. Wanted one with plenty of magnification that would sit on a table. It takes 3 AAA batteries, and the LED lights are perfect. Only one minor concern...the instructions are not very clear how to open the battery compartment. Took me a while to figure it out. You just need to press and turn.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous travel mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for myself as a travel mirror. I absolutely love it! I took it to a family reunion and both my sisters and mother liked it so much that I bought it for them. I then decided to buy it for my daughter and my husband because they kept stealing mine on the trip. They will be getting theirs as Christmas gifts stocking stuffers. Learning how to open it is a bit tricky at first. But once you know how, it’s a breeze. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: The magnification is great but the lighting now is really non existent
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that when I first used this mirror I thought it was worth 5 stars, but after only 3 uses the lights have dimmed to barely nothing. The magnification is great but the lighting now is really non existent. I really wanted to like this. Not sure if I received a defective one but will keep it just for an extra mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen N.

customer_reviews.title: Great product to travel etc
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase for this, just because my other one (after 2 years) broke while traveling. Great purchase, love how bright. Note: only reason I didn’t go rate the “suction” is I haven’t used that part yet.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I needed a mirror for travel and this one is great for my needs. It has a light as well as magnification. Perfect for me. It works really well and is compact enough for travel. Fits in my suitcases really easily and travels well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Laughsalot

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: Tiny tiny tiny. They say travel but it’s thick and tiny. So maybe tiny is a given but I’d like to see my entire face. Not just an eyeball.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Mirror
customer_reviews.text: The size and the brightness are great. Appears to be well engineered. Just received the mirror a few days ago and have not traveled but the size is perfect for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Wm B.

customer_reviews.title: Its not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product when I first received it but the batteries die pretty quick and it is very annoying to change. The product is very big and heavy (does not work if you wanna take it in a purse) not satisfied like I thought I would.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: The best ever
customer_reviews.text: Small and compact, but with a powerful light, this can stand on its on and is perfect. The best lighted travel mirror I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lighted mirror
customer_reviews.text: I received this mirror in great condition. It is exactly what I was looking for and I use it every day. The only issue I've had is that once you flip the mirror us it takes me a while to open the base revealing the on/off switch to turn the light on. (Could just me my personal fumbling). I'll just leave it propped open all the time unless I have to travel. I would recommend this product and would certainly buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: McD

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!! MUST BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this design!! It's perfect for travel so exactly what I needed and wanted. Compact enough for travel because any smaller or bigger wouldn't be functional for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I’m in the army so i don’t like to use the shared bathroom to do my makeup. Also i don’t get a ton of personal space for my stuff. This fits on my shelf and is perfect! So glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mirror
customer_reviews.text: Needed something for when I travel as hotels are not the same when it comes to mirrors - one they are often so far away - the sinks are too deep. Works great. It would not be compact enough for my purse, but great in a carry on bag or suitcase. Nice lighting and nice magnification.
customer_reviews.author: R. McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the light on this little mirror! I could use a slightly bigger mirror surface and additional extension length to make the mirrors higher, because when trying to put on makeup it can be a little straining but it's rather light weight and perfect for my carry on when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Jennessa

customer_reviews.title: Horrible design
customer_reviews.text: 10x mirror is too close. I can’t see myself unless holding the mirror an inch from my face. The battery cover is almost impossible to remove. I’m going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Nisch da Beast

customer_reviews.title: I like this big little mirror
customer_reviews.text: I like this mirror. It's pretty big to put in a purse for everyday, but I don't mind because the bulk has a purpose. I do carry it daily because I am incredibly nearsighted but I like to be able to fix my mascara and eyeliner as needed. And it stands really well. The only thing I've yet to see is how quickly it uses up batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Works well but 10X is too much magnification
customer_reviews.text: I like this mirror a lot, but I'm going to return it because 10X magnification is too much for makeup application. It requires you to be so close to the mirror that it's difficult to use a makeup brush or eyeliner. The product is nice and the light is bright, so it's too bad that it's unusable for me.
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I travel often for my job and hotel mirrors are not that great for makeup. This mirror is great for makeup and plucking out chin hairs:) The light isn’t very helpful, but I usually sit at the desk under the lamp in hotel rooms.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to open
customer_reviews.text: The mirrors and light work just fine but the bottom mirror was so difficult to open that I had to use a screwdriver to pry it open. Hoping the latch will loosen up once I use it a few times. Also, heavier than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: HoneyB

customer_reviews.title: Light weight enough and rechargeable
customer_reviews.text: An older model (though much heavier as it took 4 batteries) had a telescoping neck so it could be raised. This newer model is brighter, however.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dion

customer_reviews.title: Not super compact, but works great!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is not as compact as I had imagined, but I've taken it on several trips and it works great! Magnifying part is VERY close up. Would love it even more if it was rechargeable instead of using batteries
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but bulky
customer_reviews.text: Very good magnification and nice bright light. It is large and bulky but I will bring it on trips because magnification is excellent
customer_reviews.author: P. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this double sided mirror
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this double sided mirror. Both mirrors light up very well. Though small, all areas of the face are in the viewing area. This will be great to take along when I travel. Thank you! Kathie
customer_reviews.author: Gene814

customer_reviews.title: Nice travel mirror for dark hotel rooms
customer_reviews.text: Nice travel mirror for dark hotel rooms. Very compact when folded up but stands up easily & securely when extended Just wish the lights were a little brighter for plucking those pesky obnoxious tiny hairs. My larger home use lighted mirror is definitely brighter. But, hey. . . .for a small compact travel mirror - - it definitely performs.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: Good travel item.
customer_reviews.text: For travel this product is exactly what we were looking for. Not sure yet how long batteries will last so we have an extra set with us just in case. I like the case. The back where the batteries are placed is a bit odd as it doesn’t necessarily “lock in place” when turned closed but again time will tell but it seem ok currently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful to put on make up while traveling
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror that is good for what I really wanted it - close up and bright on my eyes so I can put on my mascara and eyeliner up while traveling. Is small so I still use regular wall mirror for full face foundation, blush, etc. It is what what was described and came quickly.
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: Travels well
customer_reviews.text: This worked out great on my last trip. Packed easily. The hotel didn’t have magnifying mirrors. Need a stronger light. I was lucky to be able to use it by a window. It stays extended when you pull it up which was nice also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I got the mirror to take on my trip to Italy but found it to be bulky and difficult to open. Once I did get it open it never closed again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Bulky and awkward.
customer_reviews.text: Bulky and rarely use it because of this fact. Too big for comfortable travel.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Great design. Well see how it holds up over time and trips. Above rating omitted that BOTH the 1X and 10X mirrors are illuminated. Really works well. Took it on a cruise last year and it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mirror. I had ordered another, kept it a couple of hours, and returned it due to not functioning properly or at all. This one works, is very bright, much larger than the other one and I love it. Cost a few bucks more than the other one, but it's worth twice the money.
customer_reviews.author: map112233

customer_reviews.title: I like the smaller size.
customer_reviews.text: This replaces a similar but larger and much older mirror I broke a while back. I like the size and the light. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: R. Neumann

customer_reviews.title: Pose STANDS UP
customer_reviews.text: the great feature i want to mention is the pose can be raised up higher. came with 3 triple A battery to light up the LED around the morrow. The only down side i would prefer 5X zooming instead of 10X. And it should design the clear 1X mirror on the top rather than in the bottom . just personal preference .
customer_reviews.author: Steve A.

customer_reviews.title: Clear magnification
customer_reviews.text: Great magnification, very clear. Light not so good. Size is convenient and packaging is attractive but very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: James C. James

customer_reviews.title: The magnification was perfect at 10x and was just the right size for ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for a recent trip. It came on time (2 days) and was just what I was looking for. In reading some reviews about installing the batteries, all I can say is that I never had a problem. Was quite simple to install. The magnification was perfect at 10x and was just the right size for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: KatTay

customer_reviews.title: Haven't gotten the opportunity to use the mirror in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't gotten the opportunity to use the mirror in a travel situation, but just having a light bright enough to see with is a luxury for me. No more running to an open curtain to get natural light to put my make up on with.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: The best ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is, no doubt, the very best small makeup mirror I've ever used. The light is bright, the mirror has no distortions and it uses regular batteries, instead of the button batteries that most of the other ones require. Perfect purchase!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: R.Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Love this mirror!
customer_reviews.text: It is very bright, and does stand up nice on its own. I wish they made this same one in a higher strength. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror, but light didn't last
customer_reviews.text: I thought this mirror was exactly as described. I was very happy with it. However, a year after I purchased, the light stopped working. New batteries did not solve the problem. I only used it for travel so it did not get hard use. I would give it a 5 star but for the fact that it failed after a year.
customer_reviews.author: ps

customer_reviews.title: Too big for travel
customer_reviews.text: Almost two inches thick when closed. Too big to take in a carry on. Sits on my bathroom counter and is used at home instead.
customer_reviews.author: Vi

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. Great for travel, just don’t drop on hard concrete or tile!
customer_reviews.author: Viola

customer_reviews.title: Excellent magnifying mirror for travel
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this mirror. Great size to pack in your suitcase. The lighting is great on the two mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: dan s.

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I've used it maybe about
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE - I did receive a full refund. Thank you. I purchased this item on June 16 -- 8 months ago. I love it! I've used it maybe about...20 times? Today, it won't turn on. I replaced the batteries. Still won't turn on. Can't believe it! I want my $18 back please!
customer_reviews.author: Cali Clark

customer_reviews.title: Must have mirror!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is honestly the best thing. Not only is easy to carry around for on the go, but it stretches out, it can stand, includes the magnifying mirror, and not to mention the brightness on the LED lights is perfect. Definitely so happy with this mirror!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Pioquinto

customer_reviews.title: great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling. The light is bright and very useful. No suction though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I paid twice as much for a similar item a year or so ago, which finally broke on about the fourth fall on tile. I was lookingThis one seems sturdier and better built. Sending the batteries along with this item makes it even better.
customer_reviews.author: Movin' southTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great item! Great price! Great for travel! Great delivery! Great seller!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! It's a bit heavy for international air travel though.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: I love that this has a light and you can turn ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that this has a light and you can turn on one or both lights with the switch. It is quite bulky for a purse so you need to be carrying a tote to fit this but it's really handy.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: I missed the deadline for this return or I would have. The 10x should be on the bottom, not the top. I have to bend over to use the regular mirror, and the 10x only works when very close. When The arm that holds up the mirror is extended, the whole thing falls over. I’m so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: A bit heavy to take along in luggage
customer_reviews.text: A bit heavy but good quality. I wanted this to take along in my luggage. I only take carry-on luggage and try to keep it as light as possible. This was heavier than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jane in Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Worth Purchasing!
customer_reviews.text: The lights are bright enough to easily see what i'm doing. once i figured out how to position it, it made doing my eyebrows much easier! i also like it's smaller size so that i can store it under my vanity when not in use. totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This works as expected from the description. It was a bit bigger than I wanted but when extended it is very stable.
customer_reviews.author: LucieGirl

customer_reviews.title: Returned.
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed upon opening. I immediately regretted buying it and returned it. This size is wayyyyy to bulky, definitely way bigger then it looks. The actual mirror wasn’t all that great either and it also weighs more then what it looks. It had a dim light, overall not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JacquelineG

customer_reviews.title: It’s Lit!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it has lights on both mirrors. I’ve been trying to find one like this for a while now
customer_reviews.author: Slopher

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: What the h....: what on earth is this thing again? It’s as big as my head.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gower

customer_reviews.title: It is still a FANTASTIC item that I use frequently
customer_reviews.text: This is too big for traveling or a purse, in my opinion. It is still a FANTASTIC item that I use frequently. I have to wear glasses, which makes it hard to do my eyebrows. This makes it so easy.
customer_reviews.author: desertgnome

customer_reviews.title: Once opened, could not close
customer_reviews.text: Also, was way bigger than I expected, wouldn't stand on its own, and magnifying mirror was warped.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing flaw....
customer_reviews.text: I received this mirror today. Magnification nice, light nice, but after opening for the first time, it will not fully close (fully latch the bottom section). It is a manufacturing flaw - the plastic tabs won't engage to keep it closed. Not ideal as I ordered this for travel - super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly
customer_reviews.text: My boss introduced me to this marvelous mirror is one of the best ever, very helpful and easy to handle. Thanks again Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: lanny machado

customer_reviews.title: Would suggest!
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel. I can actually see well enough to pluck my eyebrows. That's how well the lights work. Small and compact enough to take anywhere. Huge life saver for the make up savvy traveler.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: 10x magnification works great for eye make up.
customer_reviews.text: Took this on a trip for doing eye makeup. The 10x magnification worked great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

product_meta.title: KEDSUM Upgraded Rechargeable LED Lighted Travel Magnifying Mirror, 1X/10X Magnification Compact Makeup Mirror with Lights, Double Sided Folding Vanity Mirror, Daylight, Portable (White)
feature_bullets: ღ USB Rechargeable: Operated by USB, rechargeable function free you from replace the battery, you can charge it with a laptop, a wall charger, or a power bank, save your money and eco-friendly.

ღ 1X/10X Magnification: Features 1x magnification on one side and 10x magnifying makeup mirror on the other side, 1x to show your whole makeup, face and hair, 10x to see the detail of your face. Ideal for viewing exceptional detail for makeup application, eyebrow tweezing and etc.

ღ Two-in-one Design: Fold to use as compact, raise to use on vanity, you can use it as a handhled mirror or table mirror, compact and functional. (Note: This kind of mirror is with bracket, so it will be a little bulky or heavy.)
ღ Bright Natural Light: With long lifespan LEDs illuminate your face, can show you the most clear vision, On/Off switch on base, LED Bulbs Never Need Replacing.
ღ All of our products are rigorously tested and made with honest, you have no need to worry about getting a defective product!
